title: Interpretation of the dream: My teeth fell according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I dreamed that my teeth were broken, and it is one of the dreams that causes anxiety and confusion for its owner, especially if he is of a beautiful age and in good condition, as most interpreters of dreams see this as leading to the death of a loved one, and sometimes it expresses the emergence of disputes and disagreements. Problems with the dreamer and his household, but sometimes others symbolize abundant livelihood and improving the financial situation to pay off debts. I dreamed that my teeth were broken. Teeth falling out in a dream symbolizes some harm from the dreamer’s acquaintances, and seeing teeth falling out in a dream indicates quarrels and separation with others and indicates... Infection is a result of worries. Dreaming about teeth in a dream indicates achieving some personal benefits and interests, and reversing them leads to the disappearance of these benefits. Beautiful teeth in a dream indicate an abundance of food and an abundance of money, while their falling out leads to some financial losses. When the dreamer sees teeth falling out in a dream From a dream that indicates the death of someone close to him, or his suffering from difficult diseases. I dreamed that my tooth fell on Ibn Sirin. Dreaming about teeth falling out in a dream means death, whether for the dreamer or for someone he loves, and teeth in general in a dream indicate relatives, and this depends on the age and location on the mother’s side. Seeing a tooth falling out in a dream indicates longevity and indicates blessings in health and money, and dreaming of teeth falling out in a dream symbolizes the death of the dreamer’s family before him, and God knows best. Whoever sees his teeth falling out in his hands is a dream that indicates the coming of a praiseworthy event. I dreamed that If a virgin girl sees her teeth falling out in her dream, this is a sign that she will marry a good person in the near future. Dreaming of an old woman falling out in a dream indicates eating too much and the arrival of abundant goodness, and for an unmarried woman when she sees her teeth falling out in her lap or in her hands This is an indication that she is facing some crises in the coming period, but soon we will get rid of them. Dreaming about teeth falling out, and this was accompanied by some blood coming out of the dream, which indicates the dreamer’s maturity, good behavior, and enjoyment of her wisdom. The dreamer who sees her pushing the teeth with her tongue until they fall out This is a sign that she is facing some difficulties and problems. Interpretation of a dream about a tooth falling out without blood for a woman: If a girl sees in her dream one of her upper teeth falling out, this is a sign of the loss of a close friend, and seeing the lower tooth falling out in a dream means getting rid of some enemies. Seeing broken teeth falling out in a dream It indicates distance from some people who cause inconvenience to the viewer, such as competitors at work. When the dreamer sees in her dream that her tooth is falling out without blood, this indicates her separation from her fiancé or the partner with whom she is related. I dreamed that I fell in love with a married woman. Tooth falling out In the dreamer’s dream, it indicates the occurrence of some disagreements between the dreamer and her partner, or a sign of a lack of understanding between her and the husband’s family. When a woman sees her teeth falling out in a dream, this is evidence of the loss of a dear and close person to her, and seeing the husband’s teeth falling out in the wife’s dream leads to salvation from

title: +10 Interpretation of a dream about a sheep in a dream: A sheep in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of a dream about a sheep by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of dreams: Sheep in a dream. If the dreamer sees that he is giving a gift to another person, this indicates that he will have an obedient and good son with him. Slaughtering a sheep in a dream indicates the death of a relative of the dreamer. A person dreams that his relative slaughters a sheep for him, then this indicates that he is traveling To increase God’s holy house. If a prisoner sees that he is slaughtering a sheep, this means that it is uncooked, it means that he talks a lot and delves into people’s symptoms. Seeing a dream about a sheep for Nablus. Seeing a dream about a lamb dreaming that there is sheep’s wool inside the dream is evidence of a lot of money and wealth that he will obtain soon. A dream about a sheep indicates pleasant events such as birth or marriage. Seeing a sheep in a dream, slaughtering a sheep in a dream, indicates freedom from pain, and relief from worries and sorrows. A dream about a sheep indicates paying off debts and the spear that a prisoner will receive. Interpretation of a dream about a sheep by Ibn ShaheenThe dream A person with a sheep that follows him everywhere is evidence of the presence of many enemies in the dreamer’s life. A sick person’s dream of selling a sheep in a dream is evidence of a short recovery. A scratch from a sheep in a dream indicates the death of a person in the house. Interpretation of a dream of one sheep. Interpretation of a dream of a sheep for a single woman. A girl dreamed that she had A small white sheep, and this indicates the approach of marriage, but it will be from a person of weak character. Interpretation of a dream about a sheep for a single woman: A black sheep in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates a new love encounter, but it will last for a while and then end. A brown sheep in a dream indicates good luck In life.Seeing a sheep for a married woman in a dream. A sheep for a married woman in a dream. Buying a sheep in a dream means that she will bear responsibility and spend on the house. If a married woman gets a white sheep from a dead person, this indicates that charity must be paid to this deceased person. Sheep for a married woman in a dream if A woman sees that her husband gives her a sheep as a gift, so this indicates a lot of money that the husband will receive. A sheep for a married woman in a dream. A married woman dreams that she takes a sheep from someone she does not know, as this indicates a covenant between her and certain people. A black sheep in a married woman’s dream Evidence of a lot of money and abundance of sustenance. If she receives a sheep as a gift from her brother, this indicates the abundance of sustenance and goodness that she will receive soon. What is the interpretation of a dream about pregnancy for a pregnant woman? A pregnant sheep in a dream is evidence of the presence of a male child. A dream about a married woman who has a number A large sheep indicates blessing and abundant sustenance. What is the interpretation of a man’s dream of a sheep? Seeing a small sheep in a dream indicates the good offspring with which the dreamer will be blessed. Seeing a small sheep also indicates the fulfillment of the dreams and hopes that one longs for. A dream about buying a sheep indicates In a man’s dream, it indicates that his wife will soon become pregnant and give birth to a son. If he sees that he bought sheep and then sells them, this indicates that the dreamer will marry more than once. If a man sees his wife buying sheep from the market, this indicates extreme wealth and abundance of money. If a person sees himself slaughtering a sheep, This indicates bad events, and it is one of the unpleasant visions. Meaning and

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about a big spider by Ibn Sirin and the interpretation of a dream about a big spider

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a large spider in a dream: Seeing a spider is considered one of the visions that leave a bad impression in the soul of its owner, due to the relationship between humans and spiders in terms of considering them as poisonous insects. This belief may be wrong, as not all spiders are like that. Poisonous, and this vision has many connotations that vary according to considerations. The spider can be black, white, or green, and it can be large or small, and you may see it in your home or workplace and kill it or find it chasing you, and this is what concerns us in this article. It is what we consider dreaming of a big spider. In all its cases and connotations in particular. Learn about Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about a large spider. Interpretation of a dream about a large spider. Seeing a spider indicates false action, bad morals, reckless behavior, a tendency to falsehood in actions, abandoning the truth, alienation from people, hatred and hatred that corrupts the heart. This vision also indicates serious fluctuations in life, psychological conflicts that harm its owner, and problems and issues that are difficult to deal with and find solutions for. If a person sees a large spider, this is a sign of a strong and persistent enemy who has no piety or shame. He is evil towards the viewer, harbors hostility and envy and tries with all his might. Possible ways and methods to undermine him and sabotage his future plans and actions. On the other hand, this vision shows a weak man who claims power, isolates himself from the people, suddenly appears and sows doubt and heresy in their souls, controls themselves, and tries to spread lies and rumors to destroy beliefs and customs. Whoever saw the house A spider in his dream expresses weakness, weakness, lack of ingenuity, and waste of effort, as God Almighty says: “And the weakest of houses is the house of the spider.” This indicates the invalidity of the work, its non-acceptance, bad faith, and the lack of consistency of conditions. Whoever said it: I dreamed of a large spider, this indicates weak resolve, loss of the ability to control emotions, widespread anger within the soul, difficulty adapting to the environment in which they grow up, and the desire for liberation. Of provisions and restrictions. From another point of view, this vision symbolizes broken relationships, a dispersed family, the disintegration of the family and an abundance of disagreements, the inability to tighten control and balance of power, the dramatic deterioration of conditions, and the loss of motivation for this. Life and reaction. With the demands of the times. Interpretation of a dream about a large spider by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes in his interpretation of a vision of a spider that seeing it indicates malice, weak cunning, deception, and an attempt to spread false beliefs in souls and infect the mind with evil and deviant thoughts. This vision is also evidence of a woman with bad character or a wife who has disobeyed. She does not obey her husband’s orders and does not obey him and fulfill his desires and legal rights, so she will be a disobedient woman cursed in Paradise. If a person sees many large spiders falling from the roof of the house, this expresses the cold of winter, the fluctuations of the seasons and seasons, the severity of crises and calamities, and exposure to extreme anguish and sorrow, and for the dreamer that. He must be patient, endure, and trust in God

title: Interpretation of trying to close a door in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Learn the interpretation of trying to close a door in a dream from Ibn Sirin. Dreams are the mirror of reality that a person sees at night in a dream, telling him a lot about what the coming days have in store for him. Future. Although some believe that dreams are nothing more than a set of visual scenes that may come to a person’s mind as a result of being affected by a stimulus in reality, or that they are an internal means through which a person tries to achieve what he is able to achieve. It does not succeed in reality, but what is certain in all cases is that dreams contain many connotations and clues with real meanings in reality. Therefore, today we show you the interpretation of a person trying to close a door in a dream from the Encyclopedia website. The interpretation of trying to close a door in a dream, Ibn Sirin indicated in his book Interpretation Great dreams indicate that the interpretation of seeing someone trying to close a door in a dream varies depending on the situation in which the dreamer saw himself in his dream and whether he was closing it in general or closed. The face of a known or unknown person, and its interpretation was as follows: If a man sees a closed door in his dream, this indicates that he is confused about something. Whoever sees an old closed door, this vision indicates his return to his old work. Also, seeing the door closed in... A traveler’s dream indicates his return to his homeland after he did not find a means to earn a living in the country to which he traveled. And whoever’s wife is pregnant and sees a closed door in his dream, this is good news that his wife will give birth to a boy. And whoever sees a closed iron door that is difficult to open, this is a sign of difficulties. And the obstacles that he will face in his coming days, which will be difficult to solve. Whoever is single and sees a closed door, this indicates his refusal to enter into an engagement or marriage relationship at this time. Also, this vision for a single person can indicate difficulty in obtaining a job or his extreme confusion about Something. If a single person knocks on the closed door loudly in his dream, this indicates his effort to face difficulties and achieve his dreams at work or study. She tries to close the door in a single woman’s dream. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is trying to close the door, this means that this girl She refuses to accept someone’s request to propose to her or marry her. Seeing a closed door in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates the closing of the doors to her wealth and work during this period, as it is difficult for her to find a suitable job opportunity despite her continuous search. In this vision for a single woman, there is someone who wants to advance. To the girl and begs her to give him a chance to think. And whoever sees herself knocking on the closed door of her room, this vision shows that she is constantly striving to achieve her ambitions in the field of study and work. She is trying to close the door in a dream for a married woman. The interpretation of seeing a closed door in a married woman’s dream varies depending on the cases, as follows: If a married woman sees that there is a tightly closed door in front of her husband in a dream, this indicates her feeling of peace and protection in her married life. Whereas if the door is closed and you are not feeling tight, this is a sign of feelings of anxiety, tension, and lack of...

And whoever sees herself knocking on the closed door of her room, this vision shows that she is constantly striving to achieve her ambitions in the field of study and work. She is trying to close the door in a dream for a married woman. The interpretation of seeing a closed door in a married woman’s dream varies depending on the cases, as follows: If a married woman sees that there is a tightly closed door in front of her husband in a dream, this indicates her feeling of peace and protection in her married life. Whereas if the door is closed and you are not feeling tight, this is a sign of feelings of anxiety, tension, and lack of...

title: Interpretation of circumambulating the Kaaba in a dream, the meaning of walking in the House of God

preview.html: Interpretation of someone who saw the Kaaba dreaming that he circumambulated the Kaaba alone seven times and prayed. I saw in a dream that I circumambulated the Kaaba and kissed the Black Stone for a pregnant woman. Interpretation of a dream about circumambulating the Kaaba. The vision does not show a girl, but rather an old idea that you had years ago. This idea may be in the field of trade, and perhaps you are working with her now. I ask God to grant you success and reward you. Whoever dreams in a dream that he is walking around the Kaaba, this means the number of years that separate him from performing the Hajj obligation. If he performs the circumambulation only once, this means that he will perform Hajj in the following year. And whoever dreams of circumambulating seven times will not perform Hajj until after seven years. And circumambulation in a dream An unmarried woman indicates the number of years that separate her from marriage. Circumambulation in general symbolizes striving and achieving goals or getting closer to achieving them while awake. Tawaf of the House: If he is one of those who serve the Sultan and circumambulates him, get close to him and have good luck with him. If he is one of those who serve a scholar and attend to his needs, Or he was a slave who obeyed his master and served him with advice, or his mother came very close to him in her righteousness and ran with her, or with him. The wife fights for her and fights on her behalf with justice and love within her, then she has something of that. Circumambulating is good news of repentance for what one of these people does while awake, such as serving a mosque or a mosque, and frequently circumambulating and circling the borders and crowds and between the two rows. Interpretation of Hajj and circumambulating the Kaaba in a dreamImam Ibn Sirin, may God have mercy on him, mentioned that seeing performing Hajj and performing its rituals, such as circumambulating the Kaaba in a dream, is evidence of... The righteousness of the Prophet’s cause and his integrity on the ground. The path of truth, and that the dreamer will be blessed with goodness and will be safe from fear and anxiety while awake, and his debt will also be paid if he owes it, and it was said. Also, performing the Hajj obligation in a dream is evidence of the long life that the dreamer actually lives and the good deeds that he offers and will bring in this life, and the dreamer approaches God Almighty and asks for His satisfaction and forgiveness. He also came up with an interpretation of seeing performing the Hajj obligation in a dream and the dream that it indicates asceticism and piety. Which distinguishes the dreamer in his life, and that he is an honest person who wants to fulfill the trust to its owners. And doing good deeds that bring goodness to all people in reality. Perhaps the vision of Hajj suggests jihad. And oppression and conquest for the sake of God if the dreamer is a mujahid or a ruler. Also, seeing Hajj in a dream of a ruler or president often indicates the safety of enemy plots, and stopping the people of disobedience. And rebuking them and opening certain countries of disbelief and injustice. He performs the Hajj obligation and performs one of its rituals, such as circumambulating the Kaaba. His vision indicates the acquisition of useful sciences, an increase in knowledge, and the acquisition of what is desired. The sick person who sees in his dream that he is performing the Hajj obligation or circumambulating the Kaaba, then his vision indicates recovery and recovery from illness, and in the dream money and sustenance come to him. Actually to get rid of it. Poverty, and if the sinner sees that he is performing Hajj, he repents and regrets his disobedience, and the infidel converts to Islam. It was said: Hajj in a dream is evidence of the justice and good treatment with which the Messenger treats his parents. And his desire for land

title: Interpretation of seeing a divorced woman in a dream is the correct and complete interpretation

preview.html: Today we show you the interpretation of an absolute vision in a dream. In this article, God Almighty said: “O leaders, benefit me from my dreams if they translate you into a vision (43).” Visions are charity from God Almighty. Which prompts the search for a different interpretation of dreams, but God Almighty alone knows the unseen. He changes her and wants to return to him in a dream. This vision shows how keen he is to balance his home, family, and children. However, if he sees that he has divorced his wife three times in a dream. This vision expresses that he will leave his job forever. Other interpretations of divorce in a dream are wealth, giving up work, separation from a life partner, loss of property, or the presence of obstacles to something. It also symbolizes the poverty that befalls the dreamer, and the emergence of what he hates And the big quarrel between him and his wife. If a man sees divorce in a dream. These visions express the intense disagreement that is occurring between him and a close friend and may also indicate that he is accused of committing a crime. A man sees that his divorced wife has returned home in a dream. This vision indicates the recovery of the patient. Another interpretation of seeing a divorced woman returning to her husband’s house is that this man will return to what he did in the past, whether it was in work, religion, or personality. A man’s vision of being at home and his ex-wife returning to him, symbolizes the return of life. The fortuneteller is back to how she was before he separated from his wife. He may return to his job during that period, or to the customs he was accustomed to in marriage. Another interpretation of this vision is that if this man is exposed to any health crisis. He will return to his powers.Interpretation of who saw his ex-wife in a dreamIf a man sees his ex-wife in a dream with a beautiful appearance. This vision is one of the praiseworthy visions that heralds the coming of goodness for the pioneer. But if a man sees his ex-wife in a dream in an ugly and undesirable appearance. These visions are not good visions that bode well. If a man sees in a dream that his ex-wife is looking at him. This vision indicates the anxiety and extreme sadness that a woman feels because of the person who sees her. Seeing a man in a dream asking to return to his ex-wife and flirting with her. This vision indicates his idea of ​​returning to her or the idea of ​​his ex-wife returning to him. If a man sees his ex-wife in a dream on the roof. This vision indicates the person who supervised the marriage and is responsible for it, and another interpretation indicated by this vision is that he will marry another woman who resembles his ex-wife in all manners and customs. If a man sees in a dream that his ex-wife has become shorter than her natural height. This vision shows the imminent death of his ex-wife. If she sees that she has become taller than her normal height. This vision shows the turmoil that his ex-wife is tempted by. A man sees his deceased ex-wife in a dream with a beautiful appearance and

title: Interpretation of a dream about hunger by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing hunger by Ibn Sirin: If a poor man dreams of hunger, this indicates his need for money. If a rich man sees hunger in a dream, this is evidence of his lack of emotions and affection. A hungry cat inside the dream: elements of disappointment, problems, and failure to achieve dreams and desires. A hungry dog ​​in a dream is evidence of greed The dreamer’s friends and relatives. Seeing a hungry dead person in a dream is good news, good news and good things. Seeing yourself feeding the dead after hunger is evidence of sustenance and money. Hunger in a dream is evidence that there are friends who are not good in the dreamer’s life. Seeing a child in a dream crying because of Hunger, this is an indication of the problems and misfortunes that the dreamer will face. If a person sees in a dream a child crying from hunger and feeds him until he is full, this is an indication of the crisis he is facing. Interpretation of a dream about famine according to Nabulsi: Hunger in a dream indicates poverty and high prices. Seeing hunger in a dream during the winter season It is a sign that the dreamer is facing famine. Chewing food in a dream after hunger is a sign of problems and conflicts. Hunger can be a sign of envy and hypocrisy. Seeing a hungry child in a dream is a sign of fatigue, worries, and problems that the dreamer is exposed to. Seeing a child breastfeeding a child after Extreme hunger is evidence of success, especially if the child is smiling. Hunger in a dream and a feeling of deprivation are an indicator of problems and worries. Hunger in a dream can indicate piety and remembrance. Interpretation of a dream of poverty and hunger in a dream. See the point. Hunger in a dream in the greatest need and need that the dreamer is experiencing in This period of his life. If one sees himself deliberately feeling hungry in a dream, this is a sign that he has piety, piety, and asceticism. And that there is a kind of self-discipline that prevents him from sensual desires. If one sees that he is hungry in a dream, this means that he needs to repent to God And getting closer to his Creator. If a person sees himself hungry and eating with extreme greed in a dream, then this vision indicates an impending trick. It also indicates a change in the dreamer’s condition for the better materially. But if he sees that I cannot get enough no matter what I eat, this is a warning that This money may come from a forbidden and suspicious path, so he must be careful in order to enjoy a good halal lifestyle. Interpretation of a dream about hunger and eating bread in a dream. Participate in seeing hunger and eating bread. However, a visionary is a person who explores knowledge, and bread in a dream is a symbol of knowledge. This indicates The vision also indicates a lot of wealth and goodness that the visionary will obtain in the near future. The amount of money that comes to the fortuneteller increases the more bread there is in the dream. This shows a hungry vision, as well as the many desires that the visionary wants to fulfill. Interpretation of hunger in a dream for a married manIf a man sees If a married man dreams that he is hungry, then this is a sign that he is suffering from a lack and deprivation of affection between him and his wife. And he wants to get rid of the many problems between them that may lead to divorce. If this man in the dream is wealthy and well-off,

title: Interpretation of a dream about grape leaves according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about grape leaves is one of the dreams that some people wonder about and many people do not know its interpretation. Therefore, the dreamer becomes worried when he dreams of grape leaves. To prevent the confusion that many people fall into, this article will provide you with some interpretations told by most dream interpreters. Interpretation of a dream about seeing grape leavesWho dreams of grape leaves It indicates goodness and blessing, and that the dreamer is one of the people who enjoy wisdom, and therefore are able to act in the difficult times they are going through, as well as the ability to complete all their work. Whoever dreams in a dream that he is eating grape leaves, this indicates that his health will improve if he The dreamer is suffering from a disease that was, and it can also mean that the dreamer is healthy and will not harm anything, and some interpretation that eating grapes seems very good in terms of nutrition. Others say that eating grapes in a dream indicates that the Gulf is close if the dreamer is feeling distressed. If the dreamer sees in a dream that grape leaves are cooked or stuffed, this means that a lot of goodness that the dreamer will obtain is his family, as some went on to explain that the dreamer will gain a lot of goodness from Delay a living, and others interpreted it to mean that if the dreamer is exposed to a family or family crisis, these problems will disappear and the dreamer can solve them easily. If the dreamer sees in a dream that the grape leaves still maintain their luster and green color, this means that the dreamer will gain a lot in material terms, Even if he is exposed to the difficulties he may face in his life, whether social or professional. If the dreamer sees grape leaves in a dream, this indicates children, and if the dreamer is female and dreams of grape leaves, it means that he will get married, and if he gets married and does not give birth, then he is human. Seeing grape leaves in a dream means that she will soon become pregnant and give birth as well. Other interpretations of seeing grape leaves in dreams. Grape leaves in a dream have indications of blessing, goodness, and ease of affairs. They indicate a person’s insightful personality and good and good qualities. They also express the owner’s wisdom or insight, and his intelligence in planning it. His affairs and his good behavior towards a movement or problem in his life. Whoever sees in her dream that she is wrapping grape leaves, then this expresses the difficult tasks and costs that she does not have the determination and strength to complete and implement. Whoever sees in a dream that he is eating grape leaves, this promises to hear joyful news, and indicates Also, goodness reaches the dreamer. Whoever sees in his dream that he is eating grape leaves, if the dreamer is sick or has a disease in his body, then the dream indicates his recovery from his illness and his death from his illness, and if the dreamer is suffering from pressure and hardship. Insight indicates a person's loss of anxiety and relief from his distress, and eating grape leaves portends goodness and enjoyment of strong health. Whoever sees or sees in a dream the presence of stuffed, cooked and delicious grape leaves, this indicates the goodness and nourishment that the dreamer or companion will gain and its impact will be on the family and his family. Whoever sees the presence of cooked grape leaves and their green color indicates surplus money and livelihood, and this indicates the dreamer’s victory and profit in trade or from his work.

Grape leaves in a dream have indications of blessing, goodness, and ease of affairs. They indicate a person’s insightful personality and good and good qualities. They also express the owner’s wisdom or insight, and his intelligence in planning it. His affairs and his good behavior towards a movement or problem in his life. Whoever sees in her dream that she is wrapping grape leaves, then this expresses the difficult tasks and costs that she does not have the determination and strength to complete and implement. Whoever sees in a dream that he is eating grape leaves, this promises to hear joyful news, and indicates Also, goodness reaches the dreamer. Whoever sees in his dream that he is eating grape leaves, if the dreamer is sick or has a disease in his body, then the dream indicates his recovery from his illness and his death from his illness, and if the dreamer is suffering from pressure and hardship. Insight indicates a person's loss of anxiety and relief from his distress, and eating grape leaves portends goodness and enjoyment of strong health. Whoever sees or sees in a dream the presence of stuffed, cooked and delicious grape leaves, this indicates the goodness and nourishment that the dreamer or companion will gain and its impact will be on the family and his family. Whoever sees the presence of cooked grape leaves and their green color indicates surplus money and livelihood, and this indicates the dreamer’s victory and profit in trade or from his work.
